summary:
Hello,
I am a freelance translator and I am interested in long term  cooperation .I am a native German , full time professional translator, current resident in Netherlands.
Languages: German<>Dutch, German<>English and Dutch<>English.
Services: Translation, Proof-reading, Editing, Transcription .
I have an experience with general with many text translations, latest projects translated: 

-	Proof reading			
•	Business documents.
•	Technical and safety manuals reports.
-	Spanish <> English
•	Legal contracts
•	Financial accounts & year-end reports.
•	Medical test documents
•	Transport
•	University CVs
•	Website translation and localization
•	Market surveys
•	Marketing materials
•	Annual accounts and reports
•	Company reports
•	Software manuals
•	Financial statements
•	Tourist brochure
•	Company statutes
•	Electrical training manuals
•	Business contracts 
•	Translation of user manual
•	Business correspondence
•	Financial statements
•	Legal documents
My average daily output is 2,500 – 3.000 words, depending on the nature of the work.
I can handle almost any file type. I use SDL Trados 2014. Immediately available, professional translator. Invoiced work.
It is my pleasure to work with you.
Kind regards, 
Johana Walter
